metadata.title: CVE-2013-4168 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SmokePing 2.6.9 in the startand end time fields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4168` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

smokeping - 2.6.8-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smokeping package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.8-2').
